about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate developer with expertise in web development
about.paragraph1: As a passionate developer with a solid background in computer science, I strive to create innovative and efficient solutions. My journey has allowed me to gain expertise in modern web development, using the latest technologies and best practices.
about.paragraph2: I am particularly interested in creating intuitive user interfaces and performance optimization. My approach combines technical rigor and creativity to deliver exceptional digital experiences.
